text: The Dodo is an American media company and digital publisher that mainly tells animals' stories. The Dodo is headquartered in New York City. It was launched in January 2014 by Izzie Lerer, the daughter of media executive Kenneth Lerer, and journalist Kerry Lauerman. == References == Category:Humanâ€“animal interaction Category:Animal welfare Category:American news websites
title: The Dodo
